Package mediatordesignpatternmba

This folder is the solution to the AJP first ICA which requires to use the Mediator design pattern with the MBA case.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Command
    Command is responsible for interaction with the Mediator.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DroneConstruction
    DroneBuildingAndConstruction represent an automated robot which is responsible for the building and constructing new labs, houses, defense areas on the Mars
    Jedi
    Jedi represent a jedi from the real world and is responsible for protection of scientist and killing the enemies.
    Mediator
    Mediator represent the mediator which communicate with other objects like Jedi so in case of adding additional object it will be easier to implement it and maintain.
    MediatorDesignPatternMBA
    MediatorDesignPatternMBA is the class with the main method and creates the JFrame for the GUI and calls the MediatorGUI class where is the GUI of the program.
    MediatorGUI
    MediatorGUI is responsible for creating the GUI for the program and communication with the mediator.
    RobotPressurizedRover
    RobotPressurizedRover represent a pressurized rover which is responsible for the the exploration on the Mars territory.
    Scientist
    Scientist represent a scientist from the the Earth on a mission to the Mars.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DroneStates
    DroneStates is a enum type which represent the possible states of the Drones which are BUILDHOUSES/BUILDLABS/BUILDBUNKERS,
    JediStates
    JediStates is a enum type which represent the possible states of the Jedis which are ATTACK/DEFEND/NEGOTIATE/HOLD
    RobotStates
    RobotStates is a enum type which represent the possible states of the Robots which are SEARCH/EXPLORE/DANGER/REPORT.
    ScientistStates
    ScientistStates is a enum type which represent the possible states of the Scientist which are PROGRAMDRONE/PROGRAMROBOT/ADVICEJEDI.

Package mediatordesignpatternmba Description

This folder is the solution to the AJP first ICA which requires to use the Mediator design pattern with the MBA case.

This program is part of the solution for the first ICA for AJP in Teesside University.
